pkgmetadata.longdescription: Topola is a work-in-progress interactive topological router for printed circuit boards (PCBs) written in Rust. It implements rubberband-style routing where traces behave like elastic bands wrapped around obstacles, providing an intuitive way to route PCB traces interactively. The project aims to provide both interactive routing and autorouting capabilities for PCB design workflows.
Topola 是一个正在开发中的交互式拓扑布线器，用于印刷电路板 (PCB) 设计， 使用 Rust 语言编写。它实现了橡皮筋式布线，走线像弹性带一样缠绕在障碍物 周围，为交互式 PCB 走线提供了直观的方式。该项目旨在为 PCB 设计工作流程 提供交互式布线和自动布线功能。
